ygData.subject: Re: what next?
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally I had decent success and had quick skill improvements making lanterns. Talked to two apprentices in the past week on my server who were asking for
ygData.messageBody:
Personally I had decent success and had quick skill improvements making
lanterns. Talked to two apprentices in the past week on my server who were
asking for help..I gave them that suggestion and both said they had decent
success rates and went up pretty quick in skill. Just metal errr food for
thought! ;) Good luck to ye!

Twilite
Master Smith

At 05:08 PM 6/25/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: Keldros@...
>
>I am at smithing 24. I have been making studs but only about a 30 - 40 %
>success rate. Should I be making these or is it too early for them? I mean
is
>there something else I can do and maybe get a better success rate while
still
>taking up my skill?
>
>Thanks
